name: Squirrelmageddon!
description: Squirrelmageddon! is an experimental satyric dark comedy of an impossible future. Genetically engineered Squirrels have overrun the planet. You are a soldier in the fight to reclaim the earth and prevent the extinction of all humankind.

name: Vortex Escape
description: Your ship is caught in a vortex, try to escape while avoiding obstacles. On the way you have a helper orb to assist you.

name: Midnight Ohota
description: Midnight Ohota is an arcade flight simulator that combines cyberpunk with 80s retro futurism.

name: Belle-de-Nuit
description: Win duels and hearts as a swordswoman at Paris's finest luxury brothel! Fight for the honor of ladies of the night in this game of swords and seductions.

name: Video Realms
description: Short sci-fi stories for Windows PC

name: Jay's Walkin'
description: Jay's Walkin' is the quintessential jaywalking experience! Feel the extreme thrills of breaking the world's most sacred law as you swerve through traffic ridden streets and evade corrupt law-bringers.

name: Erophone
description: Discover the secrets of the beautiful girls in the world by using the mysterious APP in your mobile phone!

name: The World of Xian
description: Sin descripción

name: Square Off
description: Square Off is a fast-paced, platforming shooter arena. Control physics-based battle squares in a series of speedy combat challenges while you shoot your friends into oblivion and blow the world to bits while you're at it!

name: Puzzle & Chess

name: Suffering
description: Suffering is a very difficult turn-based RPG with a unique system. The main character is an ordinary human that accidentally fell into the Room of Suffering, and players won't be able to return to the mortal realm unless they defeat every Sinner in the Room of Suffering.

description: This is a realistic first person VR game, players in the zombie apocalypse of human survival. Search for supplies and ammunition in a prison full of zombies to rescue other survivors.

name: Trump Loves Waifus

name: Dead Hearts

What would you do if you knew you were about to die in front of your friends? There is only one solution - change your destiny and take revenge.

description: Wreak the Havoc is a 2D duel base game with quick and casual matches, where the player needs to carry a reactor to the enemy base and wreak it! This game was developed initially as a graduation project by game design students from Fatec São Caetano.

name: Hillside
description: Hillside is a unique tower defence game that features lots of level`s, monster`s, and weapons to defend yourself. survive each stage to access the next, or play the one`s you succeedet as infinte and see how far you can push it. and theres many more to come in the future

name: Ji Xian Qiu Sheng
description: This is an RPG style big escape game. Players can come to the competitive map from the landing module of the space station at any time. They can snatch supplies, ambush survival, gold rush disputes, hunt boss, build their own base, and make dynamic alternation of day and night

name: Castle Wonders: A Castle Tale
description: Help Willy save a historical castle in this lovely Hidden Object game! Look for Hidden Objects, collect antique relics and play lots of mini games!

name: Bist du zu schwach oder Stark
description: You play a character die was against zombie or against ki opponents (soldiers) has to fight.

name: Raven's Point
description: Raven's Point is a town. Raven's Point is also a game. Solve puzzles and explore a seemingly never-ending maze of unnerving hallways and rooms inside a terrifying house of secrets. You're not only trapped within the town of Raven's Point, you're also trapped within the game.

name: Nero
description: Discover this novel stealth-action shooter in the largest and most advanced game built in Sri Lanka. Experience tactical third-person combat, gameplay choice and epic longshots across well-crafted levels to maximize the immersive experience of a soldier who is deep within the enemy territories.

name: Plunkocity
description: Plunkocity is a light hearted brain game that is simple enough to be enjoyed by all. Seven different versions allow seven different topics to be drilled, all while being amused by whimsical pain and rewards.

name: Kaleidocraft
description: Craft kaleidoscopes, mandalas and more in a utopian universe that truly welcomes your creativity. Share your art on a wholesome social media and be rewarded instantly with love, followers, new shapes, color palettes and decorations for your holographic room. Enjoy your exposure, for realz!

name: Aquarelle
description: Aquarelle is a surreal adventure with parkour elements, where you have to find a way out of the virtual space into which its creator D-504 fell.

name: A Knights Adventure
description: A Knights Adventure is an action packed medieval adventure game. The brave knight must fight his way through different realms. The player can acquire the help of companions or mercenaries through out his adventure.

name: Room No. 9
description: You have been selected to participate in a behavioral analysis experiment and these guys are at the mercy of your inhumanly cruel choices! it's up to you to decide the fate of of these two...

name: The Seasons Collection: Spring
description: Start your journey as Cyrus to find your sister, Ava in Spring. The first game of The Seasons Collection involves brilliant FPS gameplay with a beautiful story to remember. All you will have is a rifle, a shotgun and limitless enemies as you start discovering the mystery of the forest.

name: 100-Level Dungeon
description: "100-Level Dungeon", Turn-based adventure game in which players must defeat monsters in each level of the dungeon. Which has 100 floors By using flair and planning Which it's not easy to beat this game.

name: The Clot Thickens
description: Don't wash those hands! Be the bacteria in 200+ challenging levels. Leap from cell to cell, infecting everything in your path. Avoid darting antibodies, circling antibiotics, and other obstacles. Let nothing stop your climb to the top of the bottom of the food chain!

name: Basement VR
description: VR space as cool as you. It's like inviting friends for a VR sleepover! Hang out in VR - create, talk and watch YouTube. Customize your own social room, meet new friends, explore rooms for inspiration and cool stuff.

name: Magnery Reign
description: Feel yourself as the manager of your city. Build a settlement, strengthen your defenses, repel attacks, trade, lose and enjoy the long-awaited victory.

name: Cockeyed Helicopters
description: Fly helicopters and battle against other players to become the TOP COCKEYED HELICOPTER PILOT! 2-9 player round based helicopter battles.

name: Dragon Fist: VR Kung Fu
description: First person VR Kung Fu combat against a variety of different opponents, with a variety of different fighting styles, special moves and back stories

name: Dextrissimi
description: With multiple character archetypes to choose from, beautifully crafted 2D art, and a simplified attack system, Dextrissimi allows beginners to face-off against veteran fighters on an even playing field in a true test of instinct and skill!

name: Little Shell's Adventure
description: Little Shell's Adventure is a difficult, beach-themed, Action-Adventure game with a retro art style, open-world elements, and an engaging combat system.

name: Blokker
description: Move the blocks strategically until the balls find the targets. Simple yet challenging! This is Blokker.

name: Cinderella Phenomenon: Evermore
description: Cinderella Phenomenon: Evermore is a visual novel fandisk for Cinderella Phenomenon. This game is is akin to an extended epilogue, containing five chapters of additional content that occur after the good endings of the original game.

name: Spirit Bounce
description: The world was corrupted after a spirit of darkness was born, now Aqua, Ignis and Spark must come together to save their friends and restore the world's balance. Relive the essence of classic brick-breaking arcades in a fun adventure with charismatic characters.

name: Silent Space
description: 你还在怀念儿时第一次看宇宙骑士、太空堡垒时那种热血沸腾的感受吗？《缄默星空》是一款画面怀旧，玩法创新的星战RPG冒险游戏。多线叙事，多种结局，驾驶你的飞船，重温儿时的感动吧。

name: Adventure Farm VR
description: Adventure Farm VR is a full Virtual Reality game designed from the ground up to provide an immersive and fun experience! Whether you are into farming, animals or just good plain fun you cant go wrong with Adventure Farm VR!

name: Yummy
description: "Yummy" is a multiplayer online "hunger" game. In this space where you can eat everything, you can transform into the image of what you eat. This game is cute, sand-sculpted, and exciting. Bring your friends to play!

name: Planet Blood
description: Roguelike top-down shooter with a 70's Sci-Fi theme. Fast paced. Play as a parasitic worm, control the brains of your enemies.

name: Aztec Empire
description: Aztec Empire is a city-building strategy and city manager. Become a ruler of the great city-state of Tenochtitlan. Develop a city, build an army. Let your people flow in riches!

name: Way in the stars
description: Way In The Stars is a real adventure! Find the reasons for the disaster, save the ecosystem of the planet and colonists, and start your own way amongst the stars!

name: Peasants
description: A city builder with a twist - Putting the focus of the game on the peasants who live and grow in your community. Cater for them, deal with their shortcomings and just maybe they will thrive.

name: Lair Hockey
description: Lair Hockey is all about taking the smooth precision of air hockey into an adventure through many arcade worlds and many unexpected unique challenges, in a quest beyond the table.

name: Alien Maze
description: Alien maze is a puzzle maze exploration game. Players need to use their brains to reach the exit in a limited number of steps.

name: Super Gloves Hero
description: Can you save the Shubby planet from the most dangerous pirate spaceship?

name: Dual Cars
description: Dual Cars is funny drive racing game where you need to control the cars and try to reach the Finish line. Easy to play Hard to master. :-) Are you ready to test your driving skills?

name: Shutterbug Stud
description: Welcome to Morlock Lake! The Demanding Mayor May has invited you, Doug ‘Shutterbug’, here to take pictures of local girls for a Calendar, but from Shy Waitresses to Daring Heiresses, a camera roll full of Tricky Tasks await!

name: World Process
description: The world is roughly a futuristic game in which you play as a "human will" rather than God. The main description of the game is an uncertain fate, macro diversity of the future world.

name: Deadly Maze
description: Just an old school arcade shooter that isn't made to be taken seriously... Just have fun with friends or by yourself. This game is just here for enjoyment and not a hardcore grind. I hope you have fun with Deadly Maze

name: Randomlands
description: An action-packed shooter where you always need to be on the move. Pick your gun from hundreds of randomly generated options, make your enemies explode, and try to bring down that UFO!

name: The Battle of Angels
description: The game where you play as an Angel. After watching an event taking place. The Angel will then announce his idea for that event's ending. The demon angel, in contrast, will answer his idea for that same events ending. The winner of the boxing fight will determine the actual ending. Save your people!

name: Kells
description: Kells is a retro puzzle game inspired by games of the 90’s such as the original Lemmings, but with a gravity-defying mechanic at its core that provides a unique twist on the genre.

name: Einsteins Riddle
description: A pure, simple game of logic and deduction. Random generated puzzles enables unlimited replay. Custom board layouts let you adjust the difficulty and time needed to solve a puzzle.

name: Jane Angel 2: Fallen Heaven
description: A hidden object adventure in which detective Jane Angel disappears under dramatical circumstances. Jane's stepsister, Nancy starts investigating the case full of challenges like an ancient curse, a sophisticated conspiracy and secret relationships.

name: Fech the Ferret
description: Fech The Ferret is a fast and loud parkour game about a (cute) pink ferret. Go run around, sometimes to the beat of electronic music. Make your own path and explore with Fech the region of Marmocle as you meet other friendly animals in this vast world.

name: Inn Mage
description: "Inn Mage" is a management simulation game with role-playing elements. After graduating from the mage academy, you did not embark on an official career or a journey. Instead, you opened a hotel! What a strange decision!

name: Old Skool Racer
description: Old Skool Racer is a complete racing game world that recreates the sheer thrill of classic arcade racing games such as Outrun, Screamer, Star Wars Pod Racer and Wave Race 64. The game is designed to be updated regularly in close cooperation with racing game fans.

name: Visitations
description: Change your mind by visiting kaleidoscopic, cathedral-like spaces designed to relax, entrance and enhance.

name: Sweet Time
description: Welcome, the newcomer! We are glad to see you in the Silver Soul academy - the place where you can embody all your passionate dreams.

name: Outcore: Desktop Adventure
description: All you wanted was a nice game. But now you find yourself opening Windows apps like Paint & Notepad to solve puzzles, and searching for files on your computers that you didn't put there... Who is she? Why did she appear on your desktop? Let's dive into her memories and find out.

name: Meatball
description: Meatball - This is a game in which we play the role of a meatball...

name: Kanojo xx Switch
description: Switch around puzzle pieces to complete images.

name: Come Inside My Inner World
description: Relaxing hentai video game: win the hearts of anime girls and enjoy their poses, moans and desire... You can choose leveling or enjoying the process. And you can always remember the most delightful moments in the gallery. 42 memetic achievements included. Just don't forget to add to your wishlist!

name: 全战天下
description: 【穿越文明，征阀天下】 这是一款历时3年精心制作的跨时空大型多人在线地缘SLG游戏。力求给各位主公带来平衡、有趣、刺激的对抗体验。 我们不设置VIP特权，不出售资源和体力，也不提供类似高级迁城的功能，不设置行军付费加速功能，你可以通过攻城略地、民情任务、秘境闯关、联盟任务、纪元系统等玩法获取资源，公平对决，快速成长，真实体验策略博弈的魅力，感受波澜壮阔的乱世征途！ （本作品可免费下载，游戏内有内购，请诸位主宫充分体验后，适度支持）

name: FreeRunners
description: This goal of the game is a 3-D platforming to race on selection of maps in order to compete for the fastest time and play with others online. The game has a simple objective and was made to be enjoyed with friends or alone if you wanted to see if you could get the fastest time.

description: The game uses the experience of a cube to enter an unknown space and escape to illustrate the relationship between matter and consciousness. When the consciousness is stronger, it can break through the bondage of material and become a God.

name: Girls on puzzle
description: Is a puzzle - type puzzle game for adults. In the game, you need to collect a full-fledged image from small pieces that are randomly scattered across the screen. The images show girls

description: Xiaohui became a ticket maker who decided the world trend without knowing. In order to win the ruling power of the next era, both the upper and lower circles sent people to influence the people around Xiaohui, hoping to decide to guide the final vote result.

name: Rocha's Golem
description: The golem is a guardian for a ancient forest, but your master desppeared, and him has fallem asleep, however years later your body recovers his in one last request from the forest create his emotions

name: Horny Honey
description: Horny Honey is a great choice to expand the collection in your library! We present you a fascinating hentai puzzle with a wide variety of pictures, in which everyone will find something to their liking!

name: Lonely Catgirl is the Purrfect Pussy

description: A free collection of short-form indie games made using the OHRRPGCE engine!

name: Mark-I: Mission Pilot
description: Arcade top-down shooter with coop for 2 players. Play as Pilot of 「MARK-I」 – new prototype of intelligent combat unit. Complete short intense action mission by shooting enemies, avoiding threats and upgrading shell with different battle configurations.

description: Utopos is a MOSA - Multiplayer Online Space Arena! Gameplay is from a top-down angle, dual-stick shooter and you can play against your friends online, or against AI-controlled opponents.

name: Mumba IV: Egypt Jewels

name: Virt-U-Mate
description: Virt-U-Mate is a cutting edge adult entertainment simulator & sandbox experience meant as a creative tool for designing virtual adult content. The aim of this project was to make realistic characters using joint control, soft body physics, physics hair, cloth simulation and accurate collisions.

name: Demon Strikes Back
description: Demon strikes back is a rogue-lite action game, across the abyssal fissure and beat all your foes! Seize their weapons, snatch their equipment, retrieve their relics, and reave their soul! The demon grows stronger than ever!

name: Gelldonia
description: Gelldonia is a world full of secrets and dangers. You, armed with a musket and a saber, must face them. Travel, gather resources, craft items, trade and fight for glory and fame.

name: Not Our Home 2
description: Discover the truths on what is causing the deaths of many innocent people. Experience a fully driven story in different atmospheric environments and chapters with different characters to interact with, along with many different player choices.

name: Sneaky Kitten
description: Play as a "fluffy" cat and sneak around your mortal enemies, The Dogs! Steal their trinkets and work your way around their mansion without being seen! Sneaky Kitten is a non-violence game, that focuses on problem solving and sneakiness!

description: Create the perfect illusion of an adventure town with blacksmiths, taverns, and dungeons with monsters bred by you. Meet epic characters who want to join you and use their skills to lure the hero's gold out of their purses. Make Hero Park what it used to be: the most magnificent town in the kingdom!

description: PARADISE LOFTS is a slow-burning, noir, hardcore sex romp, set in the fictitious town of Paradise in 1958. A visual novel, point-and-click adventure, with loads of mini-games, crazy characters, and multiple solutions to challenges. 8 - 12 hrs.

description: Hopeless Dregs is a turn based roguelike game. There is a team of dregs in your hands. Hire mercs that will match your team, buy them gear and unlock different skills. You'll have to find their strengths and weaknesses in order to unleash full potential and kill bosses!
